NOTE:
  1. Not filling "On/From" and "To" dates will show data of next 15 days.
  2. Not filling "To" date will show data of only the "On/From" date specified.
  3. If the "On/From" date is not specified but the "To" date is specified, then the "To" date will be interpreted as "On/From" date and the data for only that date will be specified.
